sentences.en: Basic food products are frequently unavailable in the state shops.
sentences.cn: 在国营商店里经常连一些基本食品都买不到。

sentences.en: Funding for the new school is unavailable.
I'm afraid Mr. Smith is unavailable now.
sentences.cn: 对不起,史密斯先生现在不在.

sentences.en: If that database is unavailable for any reason, above message appears.
sentences.cn: 如果数据库是无法以任何理由, 上述消息.

sentences.en: If watermelon is unavailable, grapes can be substituted in an equivalent amount.
sentences.cn: 如果西瓜难以获得, 用相等数量的葡萄来代替.

sentences.en: In many industrial countries, figures on farmers'incomes are unreliable or unavailable.
sentences.cn: 在许多工业国中, 关于农民收入的数据或是不可靠或是不可得的.

sentences.en: Items like bread, milk and meat were either unavailable or could be obtained only on the black market.
sentences.cn: 像面包、牛奶和肉之类的东西要么是买不到，要么就是只能去黑市买。

sentences.en: Mr Hicks is out of the country and so unavailable for comment.
sentences.cn: 希克斯先生目前不在国内，所以无法发表评论。

sentences.en: Proxy server is unavailable. Try connecting to proxy XX again?
sentences.cn: Proxy服务器无效. 尝试重新连接到代理XX 吗 ?

sentences.en: Shipment ready however suitable steamer unavailable until begin august.
sentences.cn: 装船货物已备齐,但无合适船只,除非等到八月初.

sentences.en: SOCKS and proxies are unavailable. Try connecting to XX again?
sentences.cn: socks和代理不可用. 尝试重新连接到XX 吗 ?

sentences.en: Sorry. Personal checking account is unavailable at this time.
sentences.cn: 抱歉,我们现在还不能开立个人支票账户.

sentences.en: The extra energy of motion is called unavailable energy.
sentences.cn: 运动的额外能量叫做无用能.

sentences.en: The repositioning function demands the click - and - drag action, making it unavailable for other purposes.
sentences.cn: 调整位置这一功能需要使用单击拖动操作, 结果是这个操作不能再用于其他目的.

sentences.en: This service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
sentences.cn: 此服务当前不可用. 请稍后再试.

trans.tran_cn: 难以获得的，不能利用的
